name: Air Fryer Crispy & Crunchy Chicken Strips
description: Who doesn’t love extra crunchy chicken strips? The secret: using an air fryer to help crisp them up on all sides. Serve with Honey Mustard for the ultimate fast-food meal, made at healthier, at home.
preparation:
1. Preheat air fryer to 400° F.
  2. Meanwhile, in a bowl, add chicken and mayo; toss to coat.
  3. Place coating mix in a shallow dish. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken one piece at a time, rotating and pressing mix on both sides of chicken to coat.
  4. In two batches, place chicken in single layer in basket, leaving some space between each piece.
  5. Cook 8–10 min, flipping halfway through using tongs, or until golden and cooked through.
tips: For an extra crispy coating, spray coated chicken with oil before cooking.
